metadata.title: CVE-2020-7595 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
xmlStringLenDecodeEntities in parser.c in libxml2 2.9.10 has an infiniteloop in a certain end-of-file situation.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-7595` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxml2 - 2.9.1+dfsg1-3ubuntu4.13+esm1
libxml2-utils - 2.9.1+dfsg1-3ubuntu4.13+esm1
python-libxml2 - 2.9.1+dfsg1-3ubuntu4.13+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libxml2 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.9.1+dfsg1-3ubuntu4.13+esm1').
